recipesJson.name: Banana Foster
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
A delicious baked banana sprinkled with a touch of cinnamon, covered in light rum and served HOT.
This is really good - check it out with coffee

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MY2a9FUckrI

reviews.text: So being a banana fiend in general I instantly fell in love with this recipe on the very first rip but truth be told this recipe is like a fine wine and becomes more and more delectable the longer it matures. Like stated,this is killer with your morning coffee and I can happily ADV this. Awesome job Wayne!!! üëçüèª
